title: S fn,add,seats,MIN(seats),Max(seats) F rooms W seats>50 & add='*Mall*' GROUPBY fn,add,seats OB mS
query: In rooms dataset rooms grouped by Full Name, Address and Type, find entries whose Seats is greater than 50 and Address includes "Mall"; show Full Name, Address, minSeats, maxSeats and Type, where minSeats is the MIN of Seats and maxSeats is the MAX of Seats; sort in ascending order by minSeats.
